content_descriptors.notes:
This is the story of a 16 years old kid, who has lost friends and family. You will have to kill creatures and you will lose companions in various ways during the game. If you are sensitive to animals death or the death idea in general, be advised that this game has content as such.
The game is also focused on giant creatures combat and some of these creatures may be more intimidating than others.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display port for VR equipment
